name: Highway Gas Gas
description:
Buckle up tight, boss, because we've got the boys in blue hot on our tail!

Highway Gas Gas isn't just your average arcade game—it's a high-octane thrill ride that'll have you navigating treacherous turns and weaving through traffic like a pro. Whether you're a novice looking to test your skills on straightforward routes or a seasoned expert itching to pull off daring stunts in top-of-the-line supercars, there's something here for everyone.

But remember, even the smallest infraction can land you in hot water, so put the pedal to the metal and outrun the long arm of the law. Think you've got what it takes to make a clean getaway?

Game Features:
- 4 Thrilling Game Modes (One Way, Two Way) with Day/Night variations
- A Jaw-Dropping Selection of 20 Sports Cars to Choose From
- Intense Police Pursuits to Keep You on the Edge of Your Seat
